SELECT r01b.IB_DEAL_NO , r01b.IB_DEAL_NM , r01b.DSC_DT , r99a.DPRT_NM , r99a.EMP_NM , r01b.ENTP_RNM FROM RAA01B r01b, RAA99A r99a WHERE 1=1 AND r01b.CHRG_P_ENO = r99a.ENO
AND r01b.IB_DEAL_NO LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ibDealNo}, '%')
AND r01b.IB_DEAL_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ibDealNm}, '%')
AND r01b.DSC_DT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{dscDate}, '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RAA01B ( IB_DEAL_NO , IB_DEAL_SQ , DSC_DT , IB_DEAL_NM , TL_AMT , PTCP_AMT , TL_ERN_AMT , WRT_ERN_AMT , RCVBL_ERN_AMT , ENTP_RNM , CRDT_GRD_CD , WRT_DT , MTRT_DT , INVST_NTN_CD , INVST_CRNCY_CD , CRNCY_AMT , INVST_GDS_LDVD_CD , INVST_GDS_MDVD_CD , INVST_GDS_SDVD_CD , INVST_GDS_DTLS_DVD_CD , COPRTN_TYP_CD , HDQT_CD , DPRT_CD , CHRG_P_ENO , WTHLD_TBL_NM , HNDL_DPRT_CD , HNDL_P_ENO ) VALUES ( #{ibDealNo} , NEXT VALUE FOR RAA01B_SQ , DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y%m%d') , TRIM(#{ibDealNm}) , NVL(NULLIF(#{tlAmt},'') IS NULL, 0) , NVL(NULLIF(#{ptcpAmt},'') IS NULL, 0) , NVL(NULLIF(#{tlErnAmt},'') IS NULL, 0) , NVL(NULLIF(#{wrtErnAmt},'') IS NULL, 0) , NVL(NULLIF(#{rcvblErnAmt},'') IS NULL, 0) , TRIM(#{entpRnm}) , '' , #{wrtDt} , #{mtrtDt} , #{invstNtnCd} , #{invstCrncyCd} , NVL(NULLIF(#{crncyAmt},'') IS NULL, 0) , #{invstGdsLdvdCd} , #{invstGdsMdvdCd} , #{invstGdsSdvdCd} , #{invstGdsDtlsDvdCd} , #{coprtnTypCd} , #{hdqtCd} , #{dprtCd} , TRIM(#{chrgPEno}) , '' , #{hndlDprtCd} , #{hndlPEno} )
